Image Shapes

Add classes to an <img> element to easily style images in any project.

Bootstrap docs 
<img src="http://placeimg.com/140/140/nature" alt="..." class="img-rounded img-shadow">
<img src="http://placeimg.com/140/140/animals" alt="..." class="img-circle">
<img src="http://placeimg.com/140/140/arch" alt="..." class="img-thumbnail">

Multiple Resolutions

We can define multiple resolutions of an image using a good ol' <img> tag plus the srcset attribute. Where possible, providing a sizes attribute as well will give the browser even more info for image selection. More info about <img srcset> here and here. Relies on Picturefill for certain browsers.

<img
  class="demo-responsive-img" 
  src="//placehold.it/320x240&text=Small" 
  srcset="//placehold.it/2048x1536&text=Extra%20Large 2048w, 
          //placehold.it/1024x768&text=Large 1024w,
          //placehold.it/640x480&text=Medium 640w,
          //placehold.it/320x240&text=Small 320w"
  sizes="(min-width: 71.25em) 1024px, 
         (min-width: 48em) 75vw, 
         100vw" 
  alt="srcset and sizes example">

Art Direction

If multiple versions of an image are desired not simply for resolution switching but also for art direction, use a <picture> element with multiple <source> elements therein. More info here and here. Relies on Picturefill for certain browsers.

<picture class="demo-responsive-img">
  <source
    media="(min-width: 40em)"
    srcset="/images/fpo/business-2x.jpg 1920w,
            /images/fpo/business.jpg 960w"
    sizes="960px"> 
  <source
    srcset="/images/fpo/business-crop-2x.jpg 640w,
            /images/fpo/business-crop.jpg 320w"
    sizes="100vw"> 
  <img src="/images/fpo/business.jpg" alt="stock photos FTW">
</picture>

Multiple Formats

The <picture> tag can also be used to provide multiple formats of the same image by specifying a type attribute for applicable <source> elements. Relies on Picturefill for certain browsers.

<picture class="demo-responsive-img">
  <source type="image/webp" srcset="/images/fpo/peeg.webp"> 
  <img src="/images/fpo/peeg.jpg" alt="peeg"> 
</picture>
